basic.description: A study of language in the literary context, emphasizing a close reading of French and Québec works from different genres and different centuries. The course discusses adaptations (film, theatre, music and art) of literary material.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: La langue, le texte et le multimédia

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    FREN 110 or (A grade of C- in FREN100) or (a grade of C- in both FREN101 and FREN102).
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from FREN220; FREN221.
